title: ii) a) Notwithstanding anything contained in the relevant provisions of the Development Control Regu
clause_text: ii) a) Notwithstanding anything contained in the relevant provisions of the Development Control Regulations for the respective Municipal Corporation regarding the provision of Amenity Space in general, and also regarding permitting Residential User in Industrial Zone, it shall be obligatory on the Developer / Owner to develop the amenity space for users (hereinafter referred to as prescribed amenity users) such as School, Play Ground,

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
